name: Sine Fine Liber
description:
LUDUM DARE 51 ENTRY 
THEME: Every 10 seconds

=========

" Light up ten candles and open the tome

Read out the words properly intoned

Every ten seconds a page will turn

Finish the sentence or you will burn

You can not stop, once you begin

There is no respite, there is no win

With every mistake your life will wither

Such are the rules of Sine Fine Liber "

- Summoner Yakuub's famous last words

=========

Even amongst the greatest of sorcerers, there are none willing to open the Sine Fine Liber - an evil volume said to summon demons. With a promise of great power comes a terrible curse - once opened, it must be read continuously and every mistake brings the reader one step closer to death. 

But these are all rumors, it can't be true... You won't know until you try!

==========

- Open the book

- Read the words using QWER

- How far can you go before the book consumes you?

==========

Credits:

- Jakub Jakubowski - Game Design and Development

- Martyna Ciupka - Illustration

- Aleksandra Minkina - Illustration

- Kacper Kaczmarek - Music
